summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件创建用于显示图像的按钮。Use the control to create a button that displays an image. 可以 通过为事件提供事件处理程序，以编程方式控制与控件关联的操作 。You can programmatically control the action associated with the control by providing an event handler for the event. 用户单击控件的坐标 可以通过使用 作为参数传递给用户定义的事件处理程序的对象的和属性来确定。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object that is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件创建用于显示图像的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a button that displays an image. > [!NOTE] > 若要使此示例正常工作，您必须提供自己的图像文件。You must provide your own image files for this example to work correctly. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当图像不可用或尚未下载时浏览器显示的替换文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative text that the browser displays if the image is unavailable or has not been downloaded.

value.span: 所指定图像的替换文本。

span.span: The alternative text for the specified image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在指定的图像不可用或尚未下载时要显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display when the specified image is not available or has not been downloaded. 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式确定指定的可选文本。You can also use this property to programmatically determine the specified alternative text. 在支持工具提示功能的浏览器中，此文本还显示为控件的工具提示 。In browsers that support the ToolTip feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定图像不可用时要显示的替换文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在单击控件时将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 使用属性单击控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证 。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常用于事件的事件处理程序中 ，以防止在单击 "取消" 或 "重置" 按钮时进行页验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来防止页验证发生。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意该 方法独立激活每个验证控件的方式。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 处理 控件的回发数据。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果 控件的状态已因回发而更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将检查是否存在表示用户单击图像的位置的坐标是否是控件的回发数据的一部分 。The method checks to see whether coordinates that represent the location where the image was clicked by the user are part of the postback data for the control. 如果坐标为回发数据的一部分，则该 方法会将 控件作为控件注册为需要在处理事件时引发事件的控件。If coordinates are part of the postback data, then the method registers the control with the Web page as a control that requires an event to be raised when it is processed. > [!NOTE] > 源坐标 (0，0) 位于图像的左上角。The origin coordinates (0,0) are located in the upper-left corner of the image. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前调用方法 。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它始终显示 不带边框的自定义服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom server control with no border. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 用户单击控件的位置的坐标 可以使用 对象的和属性来确定 。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object. 对象作为参数传递给用户定义的事件处理程序。The object is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. > [!NOTE] > 原点 (0，0) 位于图像的左上角。The origin (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the image. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以确定用户单击控件的位置的坐标 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法解析属性中设置的 URL ， `onclick` 如果属性为，则写入呈现的控件的属性， `true` 最后调用基 方法。The method resolves the URL set in the property, writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control if the property is `true`, and finally calls the base method. 如果属性的值 是格式不正确的 URL，则 会引发异常。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, an exception is thrown. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便始终使用显示特定替换文本（可作为工具提示进行访问） 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternate text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以确定用户单击控件的位置的坐标 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string Src
Public Property Src As String
public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Src : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the image file.
The location of the image file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件中显示的图像的位置 。Use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. 如果图像不可用，则显示属性中指定的文本 。If the image is not available, the text specified in the property is displayed. 您可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or absolute URL. 相对 URL 将图像的位置与网页的位置相关联，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中，而无需在代码中更新图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 您可以使用相对路径 " `~/` " 来引用该页面所在的当前虚拟目录。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如， `` "XspTest" 虚拟目录中的页上的的值为 `` 。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. 绝对 URL 提供完整路径。An absolute URL provides the complete path. 因此，将站点移到另一个目录需要更新代码。Therefore, moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件中显示的图像的路径 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the path to an image displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(string postDataKey, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection postCollection) cil managed

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性来指定在 控件回发到服务器时，控件引发验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当属性的值设置为时，此属性才有效 `true` 。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为属性指定值，则 当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此页包含两个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和两个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 第一个文本框的控件在 `CityInfoGroup` 验证组中， 第二个框的控件位于 `StateInfoGroup` 验证组中。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 当 `CityQueryButton` 单击时，只 `CityInfoGroup` 验证验证组中的控件。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 当 `StateQueryButton` 单击时，只 `StateInfoGroup` 验证验证组中的控件。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/cs/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/vb/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Introduction to the Validation Controls
